body: Yes, the name is bad, in particular because I thought I would only have to change TH/THC, but as you can see from here, there is ATen code as well.  Maybe rename to `USE_ZERO_SIZE_DIMS`?
body_html: Yes, the name is bad, in particular because I thought I would only have to change TH/THC, but as you can see from here, there is ATen code as well. Maybe rename to USE_ZERO_SIZE_DIMS?
